document_name: Signed  Prodoc- Terminals Phase Out Management Plan for CFC in Trinidad and Tobago project.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/TTO/00035706/Signed  Prodoc- Terminals Phase Out Management Plan for CFC in Trinidad and Tobago project.pdf

outputs.output_descr:
The main objective of the TPMP project is to phase-out the use of CFCs in Trinidad and Tobago. The project attempts to accomplish this through the following:
1) The provision of recycling equipment, support and training to Mobile Air Conditioning (MAC) MAC and refrigeration service sector.
2) Introduction of a conversion programme for all commercial refrigeration systems.
3) Demonstration of retrofit programme for MAC, domestic refrigeration, and mini-food market refrigeration.
4) Training programme for existing and new recycling and recovery programmes.
5) Development of policies and legislation.

project_descr: The TPMP for CFCs in T&T covers the period 2003 to 2008 with zero consumption of CFC targeted by January 1, 2008.  The TPMP will ensure timely sustainable and cost-effective phase-out of CFCs
project_title: Terminal Phase-Out Management Plan for CFCs in T&T
